param.name: input_select
param.label: select input type
param.option: List of SRA accession, one per line

param.name: accession
param.label: SRR accession
param.help: Must start with SRR,DRR or ERR, e.g. SRR925743 , ERR343809

param.name: region
param.label: aligned region
param.help: Filter by position on genome. Can be either accession.version (ex: NC_000001.10), chromosome name (ex:chr1 or 1) or 1-based coordinates (ex: chr1:1-101).

param.name: matepairDist
param.label: mate-pair distance (from-to|unknown)
param.help: Filter by distance between matepairs. Use unknown to find matepairs split between the references. Use from-to (inclusive) to limit matepair distance on the same reference
